AND a.hospital_name LIKE '%'||#{hospitalName}||'%' '%'+#{hospitalName}+'%' concat('%',#{hospitalName},'%')

AND a.city_id LIKE '%'||#{cityId}||'%' '%'+#{cityId}+'%' concat('%',#{cityId},'%')

AND a.address LIKE '%'||#{address}||'%' '%'+#{address}+'%' concat('%',#{address},'%')

ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
